card.text: Flying Whenever Attendant of Ashtongue or another Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, Attendant of Ashtongue deals 4 damage to any target. {1}{R}, Shuffle Attendant of Ashtongue from your hand into your library: Create a tapped Treasure token. Draw a card.

card.name: Advancements in Animation
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put three +1/+1 counters on another target noncreature artifact, enchantment, or land you control. Then, you may have it become a 0/0 Elemental creature in addition to its other types. (This effect does not end at the end of turn)

card.name: Flourishing Idol
card.text: When Flourishing Idol enters the battlefield, up to one target artifact becomes a 3/3 green Elk creature and loses its other types and abilities. Repeat this process for an enchantment, a land, and a planeswalker. Other creatures you control get +2/+2.

card.name: Waking Dreams
card.text: Whenever Waking Dreams or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, reveal the top three cards of your library. You may put a permanent card from among them into your hand, and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Warden's Weaver
card.text: Reach Whenever Warden's Weaver enters the battlefield, return up to three land cards from your graveyard to your hand. Whenever a noncreature land you control is put into the graveyard from the battlefield, return it to the battlefield as a 4/4 green Elemental creature with vigilance and haste. It is still a land.

card.name: Veilborn Harness
card.text: Once each turn, when you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. Repeat this process if that spell wasn't cast from your hand.

card.name: Awoken Fleshcrafter
card.text: When Awoken Fleshcrafter dies, each opponent loses life equal to the number of creatures you control plus the number of creature cards in your graveyard. {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Search your library for a creature card with mana value less than or equal to the sacrificed creature's mana value, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Keeper of Mementos
card.text: Flying, vigilance, lifelink Whenever Keeper of Mementos attacks, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand. {4}{W}{B}, Exile Keeper of Mementos from your graveyard: Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. They can't block this turn.

card.name: Shiftstorm Champion
card.text: Trample, ward {2} When Shiftstorm Champion attacks, exile the top card of your library. You may cast it or a card from your hand with mana value less than or equal to the number of lands you control without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Wormhole Navigator
card.text: Flying When Wormhole Navigator enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Exile any number of them face down, and put the rest back on top in any order. When Wormhole Navigator leaves the battlefield, if it didn't die, return a card exiled with it to its owner's hand.
